name: Coronavirus: Resistance Cell
description:
The person you're inside accidentally touched their face after touching a door knob, and now it's up to you to defend your cell from an endless horde of coronaviruses. It's a pretty small game.

The controls:

  • WASD: Strafe
  • Shift: Go faster
  • Control: Go slower
  • Left mouse: Shoot. Some weapons are homing, and require you to hold the button down over enemies to acquire a target lock, and then release.

Pick up red plus-shaped molecules to restore your health and replace your weapon.
